short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: something to get me back in the habit of coding again

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The tool for science class, scientists, and and everyone who wants a periodic table at the click of a button. Going to google, typing "Periodic Table", and looking through the search results to find a good periodic table takes too long. With Forbainum you can pull up a Periodic table with the click of a button and find what you need on any element. For example, you can find the element's name, atomic number, atomic mass, freezing point, melting point, and so much more.
